AppPage_SearchWatermark: Enter app name/package name and press Enter
AppPage_GoToHomeToSelectDevice: Please select a device via the "Home" page
FilePage_Source_NoDevice: Go to Home to select a device
FilePage_TaskInProgress_Message: Please wait for the current file transfer task to complete.
FilePage_NoDevice_Message: Please select a device on the Home page first.
FilePage_DirectoryCopyUnsupported_Messag: Copying entire directories via the context menu is not supported.
HomePage_AddDeviceTip: Please connect a new device via the "Add Device" button
ShellPage_Welcome_NoDevice: No device connected. Please use the Home page to connect a device. Use /help to view special commands (non-adb).
ShellPage_Info_NoDeviceConnected: No device connected. Please use the Home page to connect a device.
ShellPage_Error_NoDeviceToCommand: No device... Please connect a device first.
ShellPage_Info_Reconnecting: Shell session is not active, attempting to reconnect...
AppSettings_AutoStart_Description: This app will start automatically after you log in to the system.
AppSettings_Language_Description: Select the display language for the application.
AppSettings_ThemeMode_Description: Choose Light, Dark, or follow the system.
DeviceSettings_EnableVideo_Description: Request the server to send video stream. Turning this off will stop image transmission.
DeviceSettings_EnableAudio_Description: Request the server to send audio stream. Requires Android 11+.
DeviceSettings_EnableControl_Description: Allow controlling the device via the client (taps, key presses, etc.). Off for view-only mode.
DeviceSettings_VideoCodec_Description: Request the video codec used by the server.
DeviceSettings_VideoBitrate_Description: E.g.: 8000000 (8Mbps). Leave empty to use server default.
DeviceSettings_MaxFps_Description: Request the maximum frame rate for server encoding. Leave empty to use server default.
DeviceSettings_AudioCodec_Description: Request the audio codec used by the server.
DeviceSettings_AudioBitrate_Description: E.g.: 128000 (128kbps). Leave empty to use server default.
DeviceSettings_AudioSource_Description: 'output' means device playback sound, 'mic' means microphone.
DeviceSettings_StayAwake_Description: Prevent the device from auto-sleeping during connection.
DeviceSettings_ShowTouches_Description: Show touch feedback points on the device screen.
DeviceSettings_PowerOn_Description: Automatically wake and turn on the screen when starting a connection.
DeviceSettings_PowerOffOnClose_Descripti: Automatically turn off the device screen when the client disconnects.
DeviceSettings_ScreenOffTimeout_Descript: Delay before automatically turning off the screen after no interaction. -1 to disable. Leave empty for no setting.
DeviceSettings_CameraSettings_Hint: (Only effective when 'Video Source' is set to 'camera')
DeviceSettings_CameraFacing_Description: Choose front, back, or external camera.
DeviceSettings_CameraId_Description: Specify the camera hardware ID to use. Leave empty for automatic selection.
DeviceSettings_CameraSize_Description: Desired resolution, format: width x height, e.g., 1920x1080.
DeviceSettings_CameraHighSpeed_Descripti: Enable high-speed video recording mode if supported by hardware.
DeviceSettings_AudioForwarding_Descripti: While capturing audio, also play it through the device speaker.
DeviceSettings_VideoEncoderName_Descript: If set, the 'Video Codec' option above will be ignored.
DeviceSettings_AudioEncoderName_Descript: If set, the 'Audio Codec' option above will be ignored.
UserDIYView_AddTabHint: Please add new mirroring tabs via "Home" screen mirroring
